NewsArticle.Title: August Events
NewsArticle.Content: Lost at Sea Egan's father is feared to be lost at sea. Can you help Egan ensure his father's safe return? Speak to Nola, Egan's Mother at Paradise Beach. ((The entrance to Paradise Beach will reopen for this event. This event will start on Friday, Aug 22nd and will end on Monday, September 1st.)) Double Experience/Ability Event Registered accounts will receive DOUBLE Experience/Ability gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. ((This event will start on Friday, Aug 22nd and will end on Monday, August 25th.))
